game.title: The Lost Relic
game.objective: Find and retrieve the lost relic of Antiquity
game.description: Travel to the dangerous ruins of the Old Kingdom, overcome the challenges and retrieve the lost relic of Antiquity.
game.reward: 5000 gold pieces and the gratitude of the King

task.objective: Recover the map of the Old Kingdom from the library of Lumina
task.description: The library of Lumina holds an ancient map of the Old Kingdom, this will guide your journey to the lost relic.

task.objective: Battle the guardian of the ruins
task.description: The ruins of the Old Kingdom are guarded by a fearsome beast. You must defeat it to enter the ruins.
The lost relic is located in the heart of the ruins. Find it and bring it back to King Thronus.
